items.abstract: A new highly selective method for the synthesis of (E)-arylvinyl iodides and (E)- or (Z)-β-arylvinyl bromides from easily accessible styrenes and vinyl boronates, on the basis of a one-pot procedure via borylative coupling/halodeborylation is reported.
title: A stereoselective synthesis of (E)- or (Z)-β-arylvinyl halides via a borylative coupling/halodeborylation protocol
